name: Sweet and Sour Hot Ham Sandwiches
author: Crosse & Blackwell
summary: PIneapple, brown sugar, and fruity ham glaze mixed with onion, bell pepper and vinegar bring sweet and sour flavors to these ham sandwiches or sliders.
ingredients: 1 pound thinly sliced deli-style smoked ham, quartered
½ large yellow onions, cut into very thin wedges
1 (10 ounce) jar Crosse & Blackwell® Premium Ham Glaze
1 (8.25 ounce) can crushed pineapple in heavy syrup, undrained
⅓ cup firmly packed brown sugar
directions: Coat large skillet with no-stick cooking spray
Saute ham, 1/3 at a time, 15 seconds or until ham is lightly browned
Remove from skillet and place in large bowl
Heat oil in same skillet over medium-low heat
Add onion and green pepper; saute 7 minutes or until tender
Stir in ham glaze, undrained pineapple, brown sugar and vinegar
Pour over ham in bowl; toss to coat
